ComicInfo.Summary: A little over a year protecting the people of vegas city has hardened our hero. Sacrificing his body and time to such little progress has shifted Aceblade’s once optomistic Outlook and let doubts creep in. questioning his impact, And seeing the criminal element in Vegas City increasing in popularity, Aceblade decides to alter his methods. Maybe there’s a way to get more return on his investment. Maybe it’s time for a more forceful hand. You know what they say, “if you can’t beat ‘em, join ’em”.
